caseTitle: Watan Party through its President Hashim Shaukat Khan and another v. Federation of Pakistan and others
tagline: A commission is appointed in the Constitution Petition under Article 184(3) of the Constitution to probe into the matter of a memorandum allegedly written by Mr. Husain Haqqani, former Ambassador of Pakistan to the United States of America, to Admiral Mike Mullen, Chairman of the US Joint Chiefs of Staff.
